title: [IDEA] Have your profile scroll with you
body:
Really digging the new forums, I've been able to stay with the Sion debate much easier than the current forums.

One thing is that your little profile section near the banner that has your update notifications? I would love to see that scroll with you somehow, either as part of the PvP.net banner at the top or something that scrolls at the bottom. It's annoying to always have to scroll that far back up and would make the UI a smoother experience :)

replies.body: This is a good suggestion and we will definitely look into it. Thanks and welcome to the community beta!
Would you want the whole thing to scroll with you or just a link to your profile and updates?
